2004400.name: Mole Maiden Demo
2004400.description:
The Burrow Miner League is the most popular sport in R&D Mine, and all 14-year-old Penny wants is to claim the Burrow League Champion title from her big sister Coppra. To do so, Penny needs to leave home, explore R&D Mine, defeat the six Burrow League Captains, and finally face her sister in the ultimate battle!

In Journey through Geocress, you will explore Penny's home of Geocress to find and challenge the first league captain: King B. It won't be easy however. Geocress is crawling with Trilobites, Batbirds, Stalagmites, and Landmines. Not to mention a mysterious boy who has some kind of grudge against Penny.
